summaries.novice: Learn how treatment plans guide skill teaching and behavior reduction.

novice.question: A BRP always includes a __________ behavior.
What is the purpose of a crisis plan?
novice.answer: To keep the client and RBT safe during dangerous behavior.

novice.question: True or False: A BIP may include blocking for safety.

What assessment helps identify behavior function for a BRP?
True or False: Every BRP requires data collection.
Name one crisis-level behavior addressed in BIPs.

standard.question: Which is NOT a standard component of a BRP?
Which is TRUE about a BIP?
Which teaching system belongs inside SAP?
Which document contains medical emergency steps?
Which is a key SAP component?

expert.question: Client screams to escape tasks. Best replacement behavior?
Client engages in SIB. BIP prescribes blocking. Why?
expert.answer: Prevent injury and cut off reinforcement

expert.question: BRP prescribes DRA for attention aggression. Correct response?
expert.answer: Reinforce bids, withhold attention for aggression

expert.question: Why use backward chaining for handwashing?
expert.answer: Final step has strongest natural reinforcement
expert.explanation: Backward chaining guarantees contact with reinforcement.

expert.question: What should RBT do during extinction burst?
expert.answer: Remain consistent and teach replacement behaviors

expert.question: Pressing nose to block biting is what procedure?
Why is mastery critical in SAP?
BRP uses extinction + DRA. What must RBT do?
expert.answer: Ignore tantrums and reinforce appropriate requests

sections.title: Behavior Reduction Plan (BRP)
sections.content: BRPs define target behavior, function, replacement skills, antecedent and consequence strategies, data collection, and safety procedures.

sections.title: Behavior Intervention Plan (BIP) & Crisis Management
sections.content: BIPs expand BRPs with crisis and de-escalation steps for severe behaviors, prioritizing safety.

sections.title: Skill Acquisition Plan (SAP) Structure
sections.content: SAPs define skill targets, teaching procedures, prompts, mastery criteria, generalization, and maintenance.

sections.title: Emergency & Medical Crisis Plans
sections.content: Emergency plans outline steps for medical emergencies or severe injury, ensuring client and staff safety.
